Title: Avocado Toast with Egg
Description: Crispy toast topped with smashed avocado and soft-boiled egg.
Instructions: Toast the bread. Mash avocado with salt and pepper. Spread on toast. Add sliced soft-boiled egg on top and serve.

Title: No-Cook Tuna Sandwich
Description: Quick tuna sandwich perfect for blackout situations.
Instructions: Mix canned tuna with mayonnaise and salt. Spread on bread slices. Add lettuce and assemble the sandwich.

Title: Grilled Chicken Breast
Description: Juicy grilled chicken breast with herbs.
Instructions: Season chicken with herbs and salt. Grill on medium heat for 6-7 minutes per side until fully cooked.

Title: Fresh Greek Salad
Description: Refreshing salad with tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, and feta.
Instructions: Chop vegetables. Mix with olives and feta. Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with oregano.

Title: Pasta Carbonara
Description: Classic Italian pasta with creamy egg sauce and bacon.
Instructions: Cook pasta. Fry bacon. Mix eggs with cheese. Combine everything off heat to create creamy sauce.

Title: Overnight Oats
Description: Healthy oats soaked overnight with milk and fruits.
Instructions: Mix oats with milk and honey. Leave overnight in fridge. Add fruits before serving.

Title: Vegetable Stir Fry
Description: Quick stir-fried vegetables with soy sauce.
Instructions: Heat oil in pan. Add chopped vegetables. Stir fry for 7-10 minutes. Add soy sauce and serve.

Title: Peanut Butter Banana Wrap
Description: Simple wrap with peanut butter and banana slices.
Instructions: Spread peanut butter on tortilla. Add banana slices. Roll tightly and slice.

Title: Baked Salmon
Description: Oven-baked salmon with lemon and herbs.
Instructions: Season salmon with salt, pepper, lemon juice. Bake at 180Â°C for 20 minutes.

Title: Caprese Salad
Description: Tomato, mozzarella, and basil salad.
Instructions: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella. Layer with basil leaves. Drizzle olive oil and season.

Title: Scrambled Eggs
Description: Soft scrambled eggs with butter.
Instructions: Whisk eggs. Cook slowly in butter while stirring until creamy.

Title: Cold Pasta Salad
Description: Pre-cooked pasta mixed with vegetables and dressing.
Instructions: Mix pre-cooked pasta with chopped vegetables and dressing. Chill before serving.

Title: Beef Stew
Description: Slow-cooked beef with vegetables.
Instructions: Brown beef. Add vegetables and broth. Simmer for 1 hour until tender.

Title: Energy Snack Plate
Description: Plate with nuts, cheese, fruits, and crackers.
Instructions: Arrange nuts, sliced cheese, fruits, and crackers on a plate. Serve immediately.

Title: Omelette with Vegetables
Description: Fluffy omelette filled with fresh vegetables.
Instructions: Whisk eggs. Pour into pan. Add chopped vegetables. Fold and cook until set.

Title: Couscous Salad
Description: Light couscous salad with fresh herbs.
Instructions: Prepare couscous with hot water. Mix with chopped vegetables and herbs.

Title: Chicken Wrap
Description: Grilled chicken wrapped in tortilla with vegetables.
Instructions: Cook chicken pieces. Place in tortilla with vegetables and sauce. Roll and serve.

Title: Fruit Yogurt Bowl
Description: Creamy yogurt topped with fresh fruits and honey.
Instructions: Pour yogurt into bowl. Add sliced fruits and drizzle honey on top.

Title: Pan-Fried Shrimp
Description: Garlic shrimp cooked in butter.
Instructions: Heat butter in pan. Add garlic and shrimp. Cook 2-3 minutes per side.

Title: No-Cook Hummus Plate
Description: Hummus served with fresh vegetables and pita bread.
Instructions: Place hummus in bowl. Arrange sliced vegetables and pita around it. Serve immediately.
